        #include <stdio.h>

        #define MOD 1000000007

        int main() {
            int N;
            scanf("%d", &N);
            getchar(); // to consume the newline

            double total = 0.0;
            for (int i = 0; i < N; i++) {
                char line[100];
                fgets(line, sizeof(line), stdin);
                line[strcspn(line, "\n")] = 0; // remove newline

                // Split the line
                char *token = strtok(line, " ");
                double value = atof(token);
                token = strtok(NULL, " ");
                if (strcmp(token, "BTC") == 0) {
                    value *= 380000.0;
                }
                total += value;
            }

            // Now, format total as a string without newline, in the way described.
            char buffer[1024];
            snprintf(buffer, sizeof(buffer), "%.15g", total);

            // Check for '.' and exponent
            int has_dot = 0;
            int has_exp = 0;
            for (int i = 0; buffer[i]; i++) {
                if (buffer[i] == '.') has_dot = 1;
                if (buffer[i] == 'e' || buffer[i] == 'E') has_exp = 1;
            }
            if (!has_dot && !has_exp) {
                strcat(buffer, ".0");
            }

            // Now, buffer is the string for the second part.
            char *l = buffer;
            int n = strlen(l);

            // dp[i][0] and dp[i][1] for i in [0, n]
            long long dp[n+1][2];
            for (int i = 0; i <= n; i++) {
                dp[i][0] = 0;
                dp[i][1] = 0;
            }
            dp[0][0] = 1; // initial state

            for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
                char c = l[i];
                if (c == '0') {
                    dp[i+1][0] = (dp[i+1][0] + dp[i][0]) % MOD;
                    dp[i+1][1] = (dp[i+1][1] + dp[i][1] * 3) % MOD;
                } else {
                    // non-zero: treat as '1'
                    dp[i+1][0] = (dp[i+1][0] + dp[i][0] * 2) % MOD;
                    dp[i+1][1] = (dp[i+1][1] + dp[i][0]) % MOD;
                    dp[i+1][1] = (dp[i+1][1] + dp[i][1] * 3) % MOD;
                }
            }
            long long result = (dp[n][0] + dp[n][1]) % MOD;
            printf("%lld\n", result);

            return 0;
        }
